name: Cat Kitty Makeup Salon
description:
Hi everyone, welcome to IGameCrazy Cat Kitty Makeup Salon. Features:
• Choose cute Cat Kitty baby
• A huge variety of decoration items to choose, including funny band-aid, colorful ice packs, attractive infusion bottles and so on
• Kitty baby will have various expressions and sounds when you are treating them
• Continued improvements of this game, please feel free to send us your feedbacks and suggestions

Need You Know:
This app is totally free to download and play. Enjoy the game and make your Kitty smell good and look awesome.
